name: The Capital
description: Center of civilization. Home to the Archives, Senate, and scholars who maintain the world's knowledge.

name: Yeller Quarry
description: Dangerous extraction zone of tunnels, marshes, and caves. Trapping crews capture creatures for Capital merchants.

name: The Dens
description: Place of sludge and mystery. The oldest thing in Densworld, where boundaries shift and dissolution threatens.

name: Tower of Mirado
description: Legendary stone tower rising from desert sands. Under siege for generations by The Colonel.

name: Mirado Sticks
description: Settlement in the tower's shadow. Ordinary life against an extraordinary backdrop.

name: Northo
description: Religious heartland. Churches, prayer, faithâ€”and doubt. Ascetics withdraw to isolated villages.

name: North Town
description: Border region between Northo and Yeller Quarry. A place of warnings and secrets.

name: Dead River
description: A place that may not exist. Named on maps, absent on the ground. Structure without substance.

name: Capeast
description: East of the Capital. Festivals, prayers, and economic experiments with experience futures.

name: Heeshok
description: Northern town mentioned in connection with the north roads and the Capital's reach.

name: Densmok
description: Suburban coders' enclave. Home to Klutch Community College.
